data.text: Eka Ayub nodwoko ni,
“Asewinjo weche machal kamago mathoth;
Wecheu moywarego biro rumo karangʼo?
Ka dabed ni un ema uwinjo marach kaka awinjoni,
To dhoga dine ojiwou;
“To kata awuo manade, to rem ma an-go medore ameda;
Kuom adier, yaye Nyasaye, isedwoka piny mogik,
Isemaka kaka jasiki, mi adhero ma adongʼ choke lilo,
Nyasaye ok dwara omiyo osegoyo denda gi tuoche magalagala ka en gi mirima
Ji ngʼamo dhogi ka gijara;
Nyasaye osejwangʼa e lwet joma timbegi richo
Gik moko duto ne dhina maber, to koro osetieka;
kendo aserni mage olwora koni gi koni.
Ohinyo denda kinde ka kinde;
“Asetwangʼo pien gugru mi arwako
Ywak osemiyo wangʼa olokore makwar,
to lwetena pok otimo tim mahundu kata dichiel
“Yaye lowo, kik iyie iyik remba;
Kata mana sani ngʼat matimo nenda maber ni e polo,
Osiepena jara
okwayo Nyasaye kolamo kar ngʼama chielo
“Adongʼ gi higni matin nono,
